summary: Instagram clone - a social media app replicating Instagram's core features
architectural_notes: Social media platform requiring user authentication system
Image and video storage and streaming infrastructure needed
Real-time feed updates and notifications system
Scalable backend to handle multiple users and content
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Default user profile placeholder avatar, circular format, neutral gray silhouette on light background (default-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
- App logo for header navigation, clean and minimal wordmark design (app-logo.dim_150x50.png)
- Empty state illustration for when user has no posts yet, friendly and minimal (empty-posts.dim_300x300.png)

existing_features.title: Create a photo and video feed displaying posts from users the current user follows, with infinite scroll functionality
Implement user profile pages with profile picture, bio, follower/following counts, and a grid view of the user's posts
Create photo and video upload functionality with caption input and basic image filters
Add like, comment, and share functionality to all posts
Implement follow and unfollow functionality between users
Create a Stories feature where users can post temporary content that expires after 24 hours
Build a direct messaging system allowing users to send text messages to each other
Create an Explore page for discovering new content and users
Design a cohesive visual theme with a modern, photo-focused aesthetic using clean layouts, ample whitespace, and a monochromatic color scheme with accent colors for interactive elements

new_feature_requests.summary: Photo/video feed with posts from followed users
User profiles with bio, profile picture, and post grid
Photo/video upload with filters and editing
Like, comment, and share functionality on posts
Explore page to discover new content
